articles.description: The latest from filmmaker Ali Abbasi, premiering in Cannes, sees a journalist track down a man killing prostitutes in Iran. It’s guilty of the very misogyny it’s criticizing.
articles.content: A serial killer roams the streets at night, picking off desperate prostituted women, many of whom are hooked on crack, and strangles them to death in his home. A young female journalist, who is (natu… [+5313 chars]

articles.title: Laura Dern, 55, and Sam Neill, 74, reflect on their 19-year age gap as Jurassic Park love interests - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 55-year-old Oscar winner was 25 and the 74-year-old Emmy nominee was 44 when production began in August 1992 on the original film
articles.content:
On Sunday, Laura Dern and Sam Neill did some serious reflection on their 19-year age gap while portraying love interests in the original Jurassic Park.

articles.description: A series of emotional send-offs overshadows the laughs in this season-ender.
